title: Re introducing pre-game ranked borders?
body: I think allowing an option for people to see enemy rank in pregame loading screen would be a good update to the game, because it's been lame ever since they introduced not being able to see it. IMO

replies.body:
This to me seems like a bad idea because like many people that constantly look up op.gg for current game, when they see enemy having higher rank than they are, their confidence goes boom and starts complaining before game even begins. 
There are ups and downs to this, it all depends on the individual that think if its a yay or nay thing
